details.ask: Confirm owner + target dates for M1 (core loop) and M3 (playtestable slice) per front to align Campaign 1 milestones.

proposed_defaults.note: Defaults applied if no objections by deadline; please override with owner + date.

instructions: Reply with owner name and target dates for M1 and M3 by the deadline
If unchanged, reply with NO-CHANGE plus owner + dates
If dates must shift, include new targets and blockers
summary: Nudging all fronts to confirm owners and target dates for M1 (core loop) and M3 (playtest slice) under ORDER-060; will adopt provisional targets if no objections by deadline.
